p: LC analyses were carried out on a Shimadzu liquid chromatography system (Kyoto, Japan) consisting of a CBM-20A controller, two LC-20AD dual-plunger parallel-flow pumps, a DGU-20A5R degasser, a SIL-20AC autosampler, an SPD-M30A photo diode array detector and an LCMS-2020 mass spectrometer, through an ESI source (Shimadzu, Kyoto, Japan).
